purpose: To provide a comprehensive CLI tool for threat modeling and visualizing AI agents built using popular frameworks
principle: Leverages frameworks like LangGraph, AutoGen, and CrewAI to model and visualize AI agent interactions and potential security threats
reusability: Designed to be extensible with support for various AI frameworks, offering a modular approach to threat modeling in AI systems
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited support for newer frameworks, and requires familiarity with CLI tools
name: Agent-Wiz
description: A CLI tool for threat modeling and visualizing AI agents built using popular frameworks like LangGraph, AutoGen, CrewAI, and more.
highlight: Unique CLI tool for threat modeling and visualizing AI agents across multiple frameworks
